description._content: Collection: Crowe (Milburn J.) Photograph Album Call number: PI/2005.0015 System ID: 94508. Link to the catalog The Crowe (Milburn J.) album. (top left) indexed as: M. V. Montgomery notes: “M. V. Mont.” Mary Virginia Montgomery? photographer: H. J. Herrick, Vicksburg, Mississippi (top right) indexed as: B. J. Porter notes: “B. J. Porter.” Bell J. Porter? photographer: Salter, Indianapolis, Indiana (bottom left) indexed as: Isaiah Montgomery notes: “I. T. Montgomery.” This looks more like William Thornton than Isaiah. (bottom right) indexed as: J. E. Ousley notes: “J. E. Ousley.” Joseph Emory Ousley (Bolivar County Circuit Clerk and former resident of Davis Bend) Please see our profile page for information on ordering. Credit: Courtesy of the Mississippi Department of Archives and History
